articles.title: Company involved in Coldplay KissCam drama hires Gwyneth Paltrow as spokesperson - AP News
articles.description: A tech company whose CEO resigned after being caught on video at a Coldplay concert embracing another employee has hired Gwyneth Paltrow as a temporary spokesperson. The “Shakespeare in Love” and “Ironman," star, who was previously married to the band's front…
articles.content: BOSTON (AP) Astronomer the company whose CEO resigned after being caught on a KissCam at a Coldplay rock concert embracing a woman who was not his wife is trying to move on from the drama with someon… [+1754 chars]
